name: SuperHero API App
summary: This app allows you to search for your favourite superheros and save them into a list!

name: Weather Dashboard App
summary: This app allows you to search a weather in specific areas and also get a 5 day weather forecast to plan around!

name: Team Profile Generator App
summary: This command-line app generates a team based on user input using node js!

name: Planner App
summary: This app alows you to schedule appointments using local storage and moment js!

name: Password Generator App
summary: This app allows you to create a strong password to use for all your internet activity!

name: Coding Quiz App
summary: This is a quiz to test your coding knowledge! highscores can be saved!
